main.description: A reusable scope atom for work scope logic expressions. Scopes can represent topics, languages, domains, deliverables, methods, regions, tags, or other categorical labels.

createdAt.description: Client-declared timestamp when this record was originally created

key.description: Lowercase, hyphenated machine-readable key for this scope (e.g., 'ipfs', 'go-lang', 'filecoin').

kind.description: Category type of this scope. Recommended values: topic, language, domain, method, tag.

description.description: Optional longer description of this scope.

parent.description: Optional strong reference to a parent scope record for taxonomy/hierarchy support.

aliases.description: Optional array of alternative names or identifiers for this scope.

externalReference.description: Optional external reference for this scope as a URI or blob.
